subclasses.alabastria_context: Grandmasters in Alabastria often serve as military advisors to kingdoms and guild leaders. Their strategic minds are crucial for planning large-scale operations against the most dangerous threats.
subclasses.playstyle: Long-term strategic planning and battlefield control. Perfect for players who enjoy complex tactical scenarios.

prominent_continents.reason: The political complexity and diverse populations of Skratonia require master strategists to coordinate between different city-states and manage international diplomacy.
The ongoing political tensions and resource conflicts in Kamalatman demand strategic minds to navigate the complex web of rebellions and negotiations.

races.name: Human
races.continent_reason: Humans' adaptability and political acumen make them natural grandmasters in Skratonia's complex political landscape.
races.subclass_reason: Human intelligence and strategic thinking excel in long-term planning and diplomatic coordination.

races.name: Elf
races.continent_reason: Elven longevity and wisdom make them exceptional grandmasters, able to plan strategies that span decades.
races.subclass_reason: Elven patience and long-term thinking are perfect for grand strategy and complex tactical planning.

races.name: Dwarf
races.continent_reason: Dwarven military traditions and defensive strategies make them natural grandmasters in Bulsania's militarized society.
races.subclass_reason: Dwarven discipline and tactical expertise excel in large-scale military operations and defensive strategies.

races.name: Halfling
races.continent_reason: Halfling communities in Skratonia value clever planning and resource management, producing excellent grandmasters.
races.subclass_reason: Halfling ingenuity and community-focused thinking make them excellent at coordinating large-scale operations.

subclasses.alabastria_context: Mentalists in Alabastria often work with the Huntbound Order's intelligence operations, using their psionic abilities to gather information and coordinate covert missions.
subclasses.playstyle: Psionic support and battlefield communication. Great for players who want to combine strategy with mental powers.

prominent_continents.reason: The magical anomalies and psionic phenomena in Kuriguer's forests attract and enhance mentalist abilities.
The diverse populations and complex politics of Skratonia require mentalists for intelligence gathering and coordination.

races.name: Kalashtar
races.continent_reason: Kalashtar's natural psionic abilities and connection to the dream plane make them exceptional mentalists in Skratonia's diverse society.
races.subclass_reason: Kalashtar psionic abilities and telepathic communication are perfect for mentalist tactics and coordination.

races.name: Gith
races.continent_reason: Gith psionic heritage and mental discipline make them natural mentalists in Kuriguer's magical environment.
races.subclass_reason: Gith psionic powers and mental training excel in telepathic communication and battlefield coordination.

races.name: Elf
races.continent_reason: Elven mental discipline and magical sensitivity make them excellent mentalists in Kuriguer's magical forests.
races.subclass_reason: Elven mental focus and magical aptitude enhance psionic abilities and strategic thinking.

subclasses.alabastria_context: Scholars in Alabastria often work in the magical academies of Kuriguer, studying ancient warfare and developing new tactics for modern threats.
subclasses.playstyle: Knowledge-based strategy and research. Ideal for players who enjoy learning about enemy types and developing counter-strategies.

prominent_continents.reason: The magical academies and research institutions in Kuriguer provide the perfect environment for scholarly tacticians to study and develop new strategies.
The central location and diverse populations of Skratonia make it an ideal place for scholars to gather information and study different tactical approaches.

races.name: Elf
races.continent_reason: Elven longevity and scholarly traditions make them exceptional scholars in Kuriguer's magical academies.
races.subclass_reason: Elven patience and scholarly nature excel in research, study, and developing innovative tactics.

races.name: Human
races.continent_reason: Human curiosity and adaptability make them excellent scholars in Skratonia's diverse and information-rich environment.
races.subclass_reason: Human intelligence and research skills are perfect for studying enemy tactics and developing counter-strategies.

races.name: Gnome
races.continent_reason: Gnome curiosity and magical aptitude make them natural scholars in Kuriguer's magical research institutions.
races.subclass_reason: Gnome intelligence and attention to detail excel in tactical research and strategic analysis.

subclasses.alabastria_context: War Minds in Alabastria often serve as field commanders in the Huntbound Order, leading dangerous missions and inspiring their fellow hunters to greatness.
subclasses.playstyle: Combat-focused strategy and leadership. Perfect for players who want to combine tactical thinking with martial prowess.

prominent_continents.reason: The militarized society and harsh conditions of Bulsania produce natural war minds who excel at leading in combat.
The ongoing conflicts and dangerous terrain of Kamalatman require war minds to lead operations in challenging conditions.

races.name: Dwarf
races.continent_reason: Dwarven military traditions and combat expertise make them natural war minds in Bulsania's militarized society.
races.subclass_reason: Dwarven martial prowess and leadership abilities excel in combat-focused tactics and battlefield command.

races.name: Orc
races.continent_reason: Orcish combat prowess and natural leadership make them excellent war minds in Kamalatman's challenging environment.
races.subclass_reason: Orcish strength and combat experience are perfect for leading from the front lines and inspiring allies.

races.name: Goliath
races.continent_reason: Goliath physical prowess and mountain survival skills make them exceptional war minds in Bulsania's harsh conditions.
races.subclass_reason: Goliath strength and endurance excel in combat leadership and battlefield presence.

races.name: Human
races.continent_reason: Human adaptability and leadership qualities make them excellent war minds in Skratonia's diverse military forces.
races.subclass_reason: Human versatility and tactical thinking are perfect for combat leadership and strategic command.
